description:
Archinstall 3.0.2 Arch Linux menu-based installer is now available with support for the Wayfire Wayland compositor, Btrfs improvements, disk partitioning enhancements, and more.

The post Arch Linux Installer Archinstall Gets Support for the Wayfire Wayland Compositor appeared first on 9to5Linux - do not reproduce this article without permission. This RSS feed is intended for readers, not scrapers.
title: Arch Linux Installer Archinstall Gets Support for the Wayfire Wayland Compositor
